dct_description_sm: Designed to be folded to 22 x 10 cm. Includes inset of "Wat Phra Kaeo and Royal Grand Palace," text, color illustrations, climate graphs, and distance table. Text, color illustrations, and indexes on verso. Maps on verso: [Bangkok and Thailand region] -- Greater Bangkok -- Bangkok Chao Phraya express boat service.
dct_publisher_sm: Singapore : APA Publications GmbH & Co. Verlag KG, Singapore Branch ; 1999.
Maspeth, NY : Distribution, American Map Corporation, 1999.
Maps ©1999 Berndtson & Berndtson oHG, Fürstenfeldbruck; text ©1999 APA Publications GmbH & Co. Verlag KG, Singapore Branch, Singapore.
